meanings.definition: A group of musicians, actors, or dancers who perform together.
meanings.sent1: The ensembles played beautiful music at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The ensembles rehearsed together for the upcoming show.
meanings.sent3: The ensembles decided to start a band called 'The Harmonious Crew'.
meanings.sent4: The ensembles of dancers moved in perfect harmony on stage.
meanings.sent5: The ensembles of musicians created a symphony of sound.

meanings.definition: A coordinated outfit or set of clothing.
meanings.sent1: She wore a stylish ensembles to the party.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer showcased her latest ensembles on the runway.
meanings.sent3: His ensembles always matched perfectly, even his socks!
meanings.sent4: The ensembles of costumes for the play were vibrant and eye-catching.
meanings.sent5: The ensembles of the models were elegant and sophisticated.

meanings.definition: A set of interconnected elements or parts.
meanings.sent1: The ensembles of gears worked together smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The ensembles of colors in the painting created a beautiful scene.
meanings.sent3: The ensembles of ingredients in the recipe blended perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The ensembles of stars in the night sky twinkled brightly.
meanings.sent5: The ensembles of words in the poem painted a vivid picture.
